config.StoneBrambleBerrySeedPrice.name: Bramble Berry Seed Price
config.StoneBrambleBerrySeedPrice.descri: How much it costs to buy a bag of stone bramble berry seeds.
config.StoneBrambleBerryEdibility.name: Bramble Berry Edibility
config.StoneBrambleBerryEdibility.descri: How much energy and health is recovered by eating stone bramble berries. (Energy = 2.5 x edibility; Health = 1.125 x edibility).
config.FersekenPeachSaplingPrice.name: Ferseken Peach Sapling Price
config.CachePriceMultiplier.name: Cache Price Multiplier
config.CachePriceMultiplier.description: Multiplies the original price of caches by this amount.
config.DeluxePotionPriceMultiplier.name: Deluxe Potions Price Multiplier
config.DeluxePotionPriceMultiplier.descr: Multiplies the original price of more expensive potions (i.e. all potions that don't have a price config) by this amount.
config.BasicFoodPriceMultiplier.name: Basic Food Price Multiplier
config.BasicFoodPriceMultiplier.descript: Multiplies the base price of basic food at the shop by this amount.
config.BasicPotionSellValue.name: Basic Potion Sell Value
config.BasicPotionSellValue.description: How much basic potions (i.e. all potions that have a price config) sell for. Bad Potions always sell for 1g instead.
config.FirstPotionPrice.name: First Potion Price
config.FirstPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's First Potion.
config.SecondPotionPrice.name: Second Potion Price
config.SecondPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Second Potion.
config.ThirdPotionPrice.name: Third Potion Price
config.ThirdPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Third Potion.
config.RemedyAllPotionPrice.name: Remedy All Potion Price
config.RemedyAllPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Remedy All Potion.
config.WeirdPotionPrice.name: Weird Potion Price
config.WeirdPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Weird Potion.
config.BadPotionPrice.name: Bad Potion Price
config.BadPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Bad Potion.
config.MysteryPotionPrice.name: Mystery Potion Price
config.MysteryPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Mystery Potion.
config.PerfectPotionPrice.name: Perfect Potion Price
config.PerfectPotionPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Perfect Potion.
config.GunnarRamenPrice.name: Gunnar Ramen Price
config.GunnarRamenPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gunnar's Perfect Ramen.
config.GudrunRamenPrice.name: Gudrun Ramen Price
config.GudrunRamenPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Gudrun's Perfect Ramen.
config.SigurdRamenPrice.name: Sigurd Ramen Price
config.SigurdRamenPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Sigurd's Perfect Ramen.
config.SondraRamenPrice.name: Sondra Ramen Price
config.SondraRamenPrice.description: How much it costs to buy Sondra's Perfect Ramen.
config.BrazierSecretAlfredoSellValue.des: How much Brazier Secret Alfredo sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.AutumnCookieSellValue.name: Autumn Cookie Sell Value
config.AutumnCookieSellValue.description: How much Sondra's Autumn Cookie sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.SpringtimeShortbreadSellValue.des: How much Sondra's Springtime Shortbread Price sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.SummerCakeSellValue.name: Summer Cake Sell Value
config.SummerCakeSellValue.description: How much Sondra's Summer Cake sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.WinterBarSellValue.name: Winter Bar Sell Value
config.WinterBarSellValue.description: How much Sondra's Winter Bar sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.TriangleGrilledCheeseSellValue.de: How much Sondra's Triangle Grilled Cheese sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.FerskenPeachHoneySellValue.name: Fersken Peach Honey Sell Value
config.FerskenPeachHoneySellValue.descri: How much Fersken Peach Honey sells for. Purchasing price is affected by Basic Food Price Multiplier.
config.BugSteakPrice.name: Bug Steak Price
config.SlimePrice.name: Slime Price
config.BatWingPrice.name: Bat Wing Price
config.OriginalColaSellValue.name: Original Cola Base Price
config.OriginalColaSellValue.description: How much it costs to buy original joja cola at the Bear Family's vending machine. This price is also affected by the Basement Cola Price Multiplier. Defaults to 25g to match vanilla sell value.
config.CustomColaSellValue.name: Custom Cola Sell Value
config.CustomColaSellValue.description: How much pumpkin and peach joja cola sells for.
config.BasementColaPriceMultiplier.name: Basement Cola Price Multiplier
config.BasementColaPriceMultiplier.descr: Multiplies the price of joja cola bought from the Bear Family's vending machine by this amount. Defaults to 3x to match vanilla joja cola pricing.
config.LuckierRemedyAll.name: +7 Luck Remedy All
config.LuckierRemedyAll.description: Toggling this on will change the Remedy All's buffs to +7 Luck.
config.FairYearOne.name: Keep Year One Fair
config.FairYearOne.description: Toggling this on will make basic potions & food cheaper during year 1. WARNING: There is no notification for the price change starting from year 2
config.FairYearOneIncludeRemedyAll.name: Include Remedy All
config.FairYearOneIncludeRemedyAll.descr: This controls whether Remedy All is made cheaper during year 1. Keep Year One Fair must be toggled ON for this to work.
